description: This Python source file defines a class MLXTranscribeTools for audio transcription using Apple's MLX Framework and mlx-whisper library. It includes methods for transcribing audio files and reading directory contents, with configurable options for transcription parameters.

classes.name: MLXTranscribeTools
classes.description: A toolkit class for transcribing audio files using Apple's MLX Framework and mlx-whisper, with configurable parameters and directory reading capabilities.

methods.name: transcribe
methods.description: Transcribes an audio file specified by filename using the MLX Whisper model, returning the transcribed text or an error message.

methods.name: read_files
methods.description: Returns a JSON-formatted list of files in the base directory.
